summary: This mod adds four dwemer devices that mimic the effects of the storm call, bend will, slow time, and cyclone shouts.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds four "scrolls" in the form of dwemer devices that mimic the effects of the following shouts:

Atmospheric Agitator (Storm Call)
Cyclonic Blast Inducer (Cyclone)
Neurological Inhibitor (Bend Will -doesn't affect dragons)
Temporal Distortion Projector (Slow Time)

To craft the devices you will need to obtain the research notes of a dwemer weapons researcher which can be found in a small dungeon just to the notheast of Mor Khazgur.  Originally I intended to create a quest initiated by receiving a letter from Calcelmo regarding a missing colleague but I get headaches just looking at the dialogue system in the creation kit  and gave up on that idea so you will just have to come up with a reason to seek out the site on your own.
author: OldSkoolRPG
